mapper.select: select t1.*,t2.user_name as creator_name ,(select count(*) from t_url_blacklist where url_blacklist_rule_id = t1.id) as urlTotal from t_url_blacklist_rule t1 left join ta_manage_user_info t2 on t1.creator=t2.id where 1=1 and t1.id=#{id} order by t1.create_time desc

select *,(select count(*) from t_url_blacklist where url_blacklist_rule_id = t1.id) as urlTotal from t_url_blacklist_rule t1 where id in(select url_blacklist_rule_id from t_school_class_url_blacklist_rule where school_class_id=#{_parameter})
